title: WWE: Royal Rumble 2018 (DVD)
description: The most innovative event in WWE is once again groundbreaking in 2018. The exhilarating 30-Man Over the Top Rope Royal Rumble Match will have a counterpart with the first ever 30-Women Royal Rumble Match. Plus, Brock Lesnar, Braun Strowman, and Kane square off in the most power-packed Triple Threat Championship battle in WWE history. ‘The Phenomenal’ AJ Styles defends his WWE Championship in a 2-On-1 Handicap Match vs. best friends; Kevin Owens and Sammy Zayn. The Road to WrestleMania officially begins!
